QuestData.Title: Cloaked in Moonshade
QuestData.Description:
I do not know what Theryn found, but I know where he found it.
Moonshade Sanctum, to the west. Beyond the Temple of Fal'adora.
Whatever power altered Theryn's arcane essence... Whatever power allowed Kel'danath to create a spell to soothe the withered... Its source rests there.
I know this as surely as if I had been there myself.
QuestData.RewardText: <You recognize the relic from Thalyssra's vision.>
